p: Cells were treated with either 0.5 mmol/L metformin or 100 ng/mL insulin in culture medium supplemented with 10 nmol/L ÃŸ-estradiol (E2; all reagents purchased from Sigma-Aldrich) for 7 days with medium changes and renewed treatments every 2 days. Control cells were treated with substance-free medium supplemented with 10 nmol/L E2.
